approved.description: whether or not the purchase order has been approved

assignedTo.description: UUID of the user this purchase order his assigned to

dateOrdered.description: Date and time when purchase order was opened

manualPo.description: if true, order cannot be sent automatically, e.g. via EDI

notes.description: free-form notes associated with this purchase order

poNumber.description: A human readable ID assigned to this purchase order

reEncumber.description: indicates this purchase order should be re-encumbered each fiscal year. Only applies to ongoing orders

renewal.description: Renewal information associated with this order

totalEstimatedPrice.description: total estimated price of this purchase order

totalItems.description: total number of items included in the purchase order

workflowStatus.description: the workflow status for this purchase order
